name: Super Space-Stronaut (lia4)
description:
This is my modified version of the 2D Platformer project. 

Some modifications that I made to the original tutorial are:

-I added 3 more complex levels

-I rearranged the Main Menu layout

-I added a new score pickup that gives the player 5 points instead of just 1 and made it purple

-I added text to show what level the player is on 

Created by Kelia Patterson
